attributes.sig: Take as directed by your healthcare provider
Take as directed by your healthcare provider

instruction: Mother has a history of a condition that makes the patient cautious about medication adherence.

attributes.note: A condition that makes the patient cautious about medication adherence.

instruction: If a dose of medication is missed, take it as soon as remembered unless it's close to the next scheduled dose.

attributes.comment: If a dose of medication is missed, take it as soon as remembered unless it's close to the next scheduled dose.
